am,Armenia,Finance,6015,1,1208443244,EasyWallet Mobile,EasyPay LLC,https://apps.apple.com/am/app/easywallet-mobile/id1208443244?uo=4,0.0,3.28345,441,Finance,"easywallet—a secure app for instant payments at your fingertips.
easywallet is an online payment system that allows you to pay instantly regardless of time and location. It’s free to use. It saves you time. It’s handy and easy.
The app has a sophisticated verification system to ensure maximum data security. With easywallet, you can pay for 800+ services—more than any other financial app in Armenia has to offer.
Register and verify your easywallet account and let’s get going.
Here’s what you can pay for via easywallet:

column2: Utilities, including condominium fees
Loans
Medical services
Insurance
The Internet & TV
Mobile communication
Bookmaking
Parking fines, etc.

column1: Here’s what else you can do in easywallet:
• Open a free bank account directly in the app
Open a bank account anytime, anywhere. Pay no commission fees when topping up the account via EasyPay payment kiosks and no service fees either.
• Make fast money transfers
Sending money is just a click away.
Transfer money from:

column2: easywallet account to another easywallet account with 0% commission
card to card
card to easywallet account

column1: • Replenish your easywallet via:

column2: attached bank card
in-app bank account
loan
Skrill wallet

column1: • Keep your cards in one safe place
Add your Visa, Mastercard, Amex, and Payoneer cards to easywallet and use them as necessary.
• Track your spendings
Keep track of your expenses to get your spending under control.
• Make bulk payments
Pay for multiple services in a single click. Organize your payments in groups or star them as “favorites” to find them instantly on the home page.
• Schedule payments
Forget about the payments you need to make regularly. Set a recurring payment schedule and let easywallet do your job.
• Get easycoins
easycoin is the digital currency of easywallet. Get easycoins as a cashback and by taking part in our social media giveaways and contests that take place periodically. 1 easycoin = 1 AMD.
• Add your car to EasyGarage
The reliable online garage for your car. Check if you have any penalty points and pay traffic penalties, parking fines, property tax, CMTPL insurance bills, and more in one place—your digital garage.
• Choose between light and dark modes
Your comfort first. Select the color mode you find best for complete accessibility.
• Make QR code payments
An alternative payment method available at numerous points of sale. Make secure payments with QR codes.
• Request money
Ask for money from friends or family when you need it most.
Pay easily and live easily. Any questions left? Drop us an email at info@easypay.am.",2017-06-23T11:23:23Z,2025-10-28T15:12:38Z

am,Armenia,Finance,6015,7,1515436600,acba digital,ACBA BANK OJSC,https://apps.apple.com/am/app/acba-digital/id1515436600?uo=4,0.0,4.21712,1285,Finance,"acba digital is the mobile banking application of Acba bank OJSC. It is a secure and convenient tool for everyday remote banking. The brand new app was designed and created to make your banking simple and fast. You just need to download the app, become a user via online registration and gain the benefits of the provided services. acba digital allows you to manage your finances whenever and wherever it is convenient for you. The application will give you access to the following features:
• Become a customer via online onboarding process (some services are limited)
• Get access to your banking products via online registration process
• Log on quickly and securely with your fingerprint or facial recognition
• Check your account balances and pending payments
• View individual transaction details
• Transfer money between accounts, and make transfer within Republic of Armenia
• Pay utility bills and make utility payment groups
• Pay Road Police fines, property taxes, parking bills and much more
• Pay your loan or credit card bill
• Apply for loans, savings, cards and more
• Block card transactions, close cards, activate SMS service and more
• Reset your password
• Update your contact details
• Get Visa digital card in your application and make payments via Apple Pay/Google Pay
• Make card to card transfers within Armenia and worldwide
• Order Bank to make periodic transfers and payments instead of you
• Track your pension program balance anytime
• Purchase car, travel and other insurances
• Invest your money buying securities
• Send or receive money via Contact, QR and Link and ATM
• And much more
KEEPING YOU SAFE ONLINE

We use the latest online security measures to protect your money, your personal information and your privacy. acba digital is protected by Thales Gemalto Mobile Protector SDK. Gemalto Mobile Protector makes wise and privacy-friendly use of biometrics: no biometric data is stored in data centers or servers. It all stays within the user's mobile securely. Gemalto Mobile Protector integrates a combination of proven security mechanisms – such as code obfuscation, encryption, key protection mechanisms with appropriate key management, device binding, and root and jailbreaking detection.
This solution helps to comply with the requirements of the revised PSD2's Regulatory Technical Standard (RTS).
https://www.thalesgroup.com/en/markets/digital-identity-and-security/banking-payment/digital-banking/sdk/mobile-protector
CONTACTING YOU

We won't contact you any more than normal if you use the app. But please stay alert to email, text messages or phone calls that appear to be from us. Criminals may try to trick you into giving them sensitive personal or account information. We'll never contact you to ask for these details. Any emails from us will always greet you personally using your title and surname. Any text messages we send you will come from Acba bank.",2020-09-13T07:00:00Z,2025-10-28T05:23:54Z

am,Armenia,Finance,6015,10,919137872,InecoMobile: Banking made easy,Inecobank CJSC,https://apps.apple.com/am/app/inecomobile-banking-made-easy/id919137872?uo=4,0.0,4.4644,1264,Finance,"InecoMobile | Banking made easy

Experience the future of banking with InecoMobile, your trusted partner for a seamless digital banking experience in Armenia! With our user-friendly app you have the power to control your finances anytime and anywhere.
Features available via InecoMobile:

column2: Online registration: Experience a hassle-free and speedy onboarding process with our full online registration flow, secured by biometric identification. Your data is safe, and your journey with InecoMobile begins effortlessly.
Manage your finances on-the-go: Access your accounts, check balances, view transaction history, and track expenses seamlessly right from your mobile device.

Secure Transactions: Perform interbank transactions by simply entering the phone number or email address of your InecoFriend, and interbank transactions as well with the        confidence of top-notch security measures.
Easy Payments: Make various types of payments effortlessly whether it is bills, utilities, or shopping, all within the app.
Contacless Payments: Add your cards to Apple Pay, Google Pay, or make InecoPay (QR) payments for a secure and contactless shopping experience.
Loans online: Need funds quickly? Apply for online loans with ease via Sprint, right from your InecoMobile. Sprint loans makes borrowing simple.
Refinancing: Looking to optimize your existing loans? Explore refinancing options via Sprint: lower interest rates, reduced monthly payments, and financial flexibility.
Deposit online: Open online deposits and savings accounts with competitive interest rates via InecoMobile. It has never been easier to secure your future.
paylater: Enjoy the flexibility of our paylater solution, giving you the opportunity to enjoy purchases while payments will wait.
Global access: Seamlessly link your Payoneer account to simplify cross-border transactions and international payments.

column1: Why InecoMobile?

column2: 24/7 Accessibility: Your bank is always open, fitting your busy lifestyle.
User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive design makes banking tasks a breeze.
Top-Notch Security: We prioritize the safety of your financial data.
Personalized Service: Tailored solutions to meet your unique financial needs.

column1: Download the Inecobank Mobile Banking app today and experience banking made easy.
Bank smarter, bank safer, bank with Inecobank!",2014-10-15T11:18:52Z,2025-10-29T15:29:04Z

am,Armenia,Finance,6015,13,6476754700,CashMe GC,Global Credit UCO CJSC,https://apps.apple.com/am/app/cashme-gc/id6476754700?uo=4,0.0,3.53043,115,Finance,"Instantly get consumer, car, or mortgage loans fully online. You don't need to visit our office. No paperwork - get a blank loan online within 3 minutes. Easy and fast. Pay via the application your current loans using your bank card.
Only citizens of the Republic of Armenia can apply for the loans.
All products offered in the app comply with the RA regulations and laws. Products are provided by Global Credit UCO CJSC, RA Central Bank license #35, issued on 10/26/2010.
Loans are provided for 12 months to 10 years, with APR from 12 to 24%*.
*XIRR is from 23% to 182.5%.
Example of the total cost of a loan:
Loan amount: 1,600,000 AMD
APR: 12%
Annual servicing fee: 18%
Loan provision fee: 3% (one-time)
Repayment period: 108 months
The total cost of the loan will be 36.01%.",2024-04-17T07:00:00Z,2025-11-05T08:18:01Z

am,Armenia,Finance,6015,17,6503602559,Score Up Armenia,"VELOX Credit Union, LLC",https://apps.apple.com/am/app/score-up-armenia/id6503602559?uo=4,0.0,3.17742,62,Finance,"Discover ScoreUp:

Ready to take control of your finances? ScoreUp isn't just another app; it's your personal finance assistant, ready to simplify your loans, boost your credit score knowledge, and keep your financial goals on track.
See every detail of your loans, from your car and home to personal loans. Get the full picture of what you owe, with specifics on each loan to guide your financial decisions.
Watch how your score changes with your financial behavior. It's like having a financial health meter that shows you where you stand and how to improve.
Never worry about missing a payment again. ScoreUp keeps you on top of your finances with reminders and a clear view of what's due next.
If a payment slips through the cracks, you'll know immediately. Quick actions can save you from extra fees and protect your credit score.
Curious about who's been checking your credit? With ScoreUp, you can see the inquiries made by banks and other institutions, so you're always in the know.
Just like with loans, get a clear understanding of any guarantees you've made. Know your responsibilities and how they tie into your broader financial landscape.
Why Choose ScoreUp:
Armed with all the right information, you're set to make smarter choices for a healthier financial future.
Knowing your score and how to improve it can lead to better rates and more financial opportunities.
With our tracking and alerts, missed payments are a thing of the past, helping you maintain a spotless credit history.
With ScoreUp, there are no surprises. You'll understand every part of your financial picture, including who's interested in your credit and why.
Join the ScoreUp Community:

Download ScoreUp today and start your journey toward financial clarity. Whether you're managing loans, tracking your credit, or planning your next big move, ScoreUp is your ultimate guide.",2024-06-07T07:00:00Z,2025-04-09T11:53:43Z

am,Armenia,Finance,6015,18,1436799971,Binance: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto,Binance Switzerland AG,https://apps.apple.com/am/app/binance-buy-bitcoin-crypto/id1436799971?uo=4,0.0,4.9104,7310,Finance,"Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.
Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong.
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority (""FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).
Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.
*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges
Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:
- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.

- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
